function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implement training and certification programs for uv technicians to ensure proper and safe application of germicidal uv.","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct research on time-motion exposure to inform and improve current uv exposure guidelines for optimal protection against airborne pathogens.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide clear and specific dosing guidelines for different architectural features and spaces","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure a minimum of 25 vertical air changes per minute in the upper room","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop clear guidelines for safe and effective far uv dosing in various spaces","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Explore alternative air disinfection technologies and strategies to complement ventilation, and consider the integration of multiple control measures to optimize airborne pathogen control.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Education and awareness campaigns to provide accurate information about the effectiveness and safety of uv products","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of effective uv dosing strategies for surface decontamination, and proper training on the use of uv devices","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Training programs for technical experts, awareness campaigns for building owners and managers, and knowledge dissemination programs","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wider implementation of air disinfection technology in public settings and prioritization of high-risk locations","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Education and awareness campaigns on the importance of air disinfection in public settings, especially in high-risk environments","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Education on the benefits of air disinfection in households and the use of effective technologies for home settings","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement effective surface disinfection methods such as upper room guv","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure effective mixing of room air to maximize exposure time to upper room guv","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and calibration of air disinfection devices","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of larger, high-output machines to achieve 6 to 12 ach","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Selection of better-designed room air cleaners to minimize recapture, drafts, and noise","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase the percentage of outside air in the hvac system to improve ventilation","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure that high-level filtration does not decrease room ventilation, consider alternative filtration options","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase ach to recommended levels for respiratory isolation and procedure rooms","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of mass balance wells-riley equation for estimation, obtaining good estimates of particle generation rates","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular maintenance of hvac systems, investment in effective room air disinfection methods, and promotion of natural ventilation.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improvement of building design for natural ventilation, promotion of open windows, and addressing the limitations of natural ventilation through alternative strategies.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improved ventilation and air filtration, use of uv-c light for air disinfection","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of in-room air disinfection systems, improved ventilation, targeted air filtration at the room level","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improved education and awareness about the transmission pathways of respiratory infections","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of effective ventilation systems to dilute and remove infectious particles in indoor air","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict adherence to social distancing measures and use of personal protective equipment to minimize airborne transmission","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of guv air disinfection technology to reduce the concentration of airborne pathogens and ensure a safer built environment.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Research and scientific studies to better understand the modes of transmission of respiratory viruses, including the role of airborne transmission.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of comprehensive disinfection strategies, including guv air disinfection, to prevent the development of drug-resistant pathogens.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Education and communication to promote the importance of npis for public health","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of the positive effects of npis on health and well-being through education and communication","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict hygiene measures and ventilation in schools to reduce the risk of viral transmission","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encourage vaccination, maintain public health measures, and conduct public health campaigns to raise awareness about infectious diseases","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Carefully assess the potential negative health impacts of npis and implement targeted interventions to mitigate these effects","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improve telemedicine and digital healthcare services, prioritize essential health services","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure access to non-covid healthcare, prioritize emergency and essential care","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide mental health support, promote safe channels for reporting domestic violence","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Maintaining strict state restrictions and promoting vaccination","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improved testing accessibility and accuracy, and increased transparency in reporting","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased testing, improved data collection and analysis, and development of more accurate modeling techniques","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Further modeling and research to explore and quantify the factors influencing eta, and development of predictive models","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effective public information campaigns, real-time visual policy tools, coordinated efforts to enhance compliance","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thorough data verification, transparency in reporting, cross-referencing with multiple sources","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Understanding social identity factors, targeted public health messaging, community engagement","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clear communication, incentives for compliance, enforcement of measures, public education on the importance of compliance","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Standardized guidelines, collaboration between states, clear communication from central authorities","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing targeted measures to control gatherings and enforcing compliance with guidelines","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting further research to understand the factors contributing to divergent trends and adapting mitigation strategies accordingly","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"}]}
